alert.note: Alert for Wayne (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 2:02PM EDT until July 28 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR BOYD...SOUTHEASTERN GREENUP...NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE... SOUTHEASTERN CARTER...SOUTH CENTRAL LAWRENCE AND NORTHWESTERN WAYNE COUNTIES... At 202 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rush, or near Cannonsburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Ashland, Ironton, Grayson, Louisa, Coal Grove, Cannonsburg, Yatesville Lake State Park, Kenova, Catlettsburg, Ceredo, Webbville, Princess, Coalton, Denton, Burnaugh, Greenbo Lake, Oldtown, Naples, and Rush. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
